name: places/ChIJGTbnzqH2wokRZYWkhrPimcQ
formattedAddress: 395 Fort Washington Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA
adrFormatAddress: 395 Fort Washington Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA

originalText.text:
Whenever this place calls me to try and confirm my appointment they speak in Spanish, Spanish is not my first language therefore I respond in English and once I respond in English they always hang up on me. Then I have to call back to inquire what was the call was about to find out why they were calling. I don’t understand why I have to be discriminated against because I don’t speak Spanish, why does my health have to be put at risk because the receptionist doesn’t feel like speaking English. I understand this is a predominantly a Spanish speaking neighborhood, I’ve lived here all my life but I why do I have to be penalized because Spanish isn’t my first language. Very unprofessional.

This establishment has a cold interior, and the doctor is equally as cold. No “ hey, how are you doing?” Or simple “ how’s everything going” . Just because you take Medicaid doesn't mean you need to treat people like a number. Not to mention it took me months to book with this doctor because the receptionists NEVER pick up the phone.

Honestly very disappointed at the standards here. Feels like they just want to charge my insurance and kick me out.

originalText.text: I never had a problem UNTIL TODAY. I contacted the office for over two weeks to receive an appointment. I finally reached someone and was explained there was construction which I understood and to call next week. I followed up and the girl would tell me I will call you back with an appointment. 4 hours later , still no I call so I called once again. Finally my appointment is in 2 days. I called the office and left a message, because the confirmation machine was not working so I had to double check. Just for the firl to call me at 5:30 pm asking if I got lab work done that was never explained for me to go do. She proceeds to tell me that she can reschedule me because he will not see me and they were now following up with the patients. I had requested the time from work and need the appointment which is why I was so persistent. Do not come here at all , I will be switching my doctor TODAY. Terrible service, regardless you have to go to lab corp to complete your results

originalText.text: Unprofessional and terrible place. Phone calls are never answered. We scheduled online for our annual visit after calling 10+ times. We showed up for our appointment and were told to wait outside, and they’ll call us in 1 hour to come back because they’re running behind. We did as we were told, waited outside, but received no phone call. We still came back in  1 hour later to find the office closed. This is not how you treat patients. They knew we were waiting well past our appointment time, but they felt that it was fine to close their office and leave. How is this acceptable? I have no idea how this office remains in business with this kind of patient experience.

originalText.text: I would rather give this place NO stars. I'll start off with the ridiculous wait time to be seen by the doctor when you have a scheduled appointment and are waiting over an hour to be seen. Then you have the receptionists who have terrible customer service, disgusting attitudes, on their cell phones or chit chatting with each other and there's your answer as to why the phone is never answered. They don't check your insurance before your appointment but they call to confirm, day of your appointment when you go to the office they tell you "the doctor isn't in network with your insurance". Why wasn't this mentioned when calling for confirmation? As a receptionist part of your job is checking the insurances of patients prior to their appointments. This place is terrible in every aspect go somewhere else where they value your time and you, not only as a paying customer but as a human being. Avoid this doctor's office at all costs.

originalText.text: Dr Roedan is my Mother’s PCP. He is wonderful and very professional. Staff is also wonderful.
